trans-unit.source: Specifies the state of an axis.
The AxisEnabled enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A> property to enable or disable an axis.
trans-unit.target: 与使用 AxisEnabled 枚举<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A>属性来启用或禁用轴。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A> property is set to Auto, an axis may or may not be displayed, depending on whether it is being used to plot a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A>属性设置为自动，轴可能或可能不显示，具体取决于是否使用它来绘制<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The axes that are used to plot data for a series are determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XAxisType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YAxisType%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制一系列的数据的轴由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XAxisType%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YAxisType%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YAxisType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XAxisType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The axis is only enabled if it used to plot a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 它用于绘制才会启用轴<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref>。
